targetLine.text: Well, it's just a little bet that he and I have, that's all. Theoretically speaking, could it be done?
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: Ha. 90? Tarnation, son, who’d ever need to be in such a hurry?

contextAfter.text: Well, I suppose if you had a straight stretch of track with a level grade, and you weren't haulin’ no cars behind ya...and if ya could get the fire hot enough...and I’m talkin’ about hotter than the blazes of hell and damnation itself...then yes, it might be possible to get her up that fast.
Tell me, when’s the next train come through here?

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
